metadata.title: It's You I Love Baby

xml.lyrics:
Don't'cha know,
don't'cha know,
I love you ev'ry night
Don't'cha know, baby,
don't'cha know babe
I love you, no matter what they say
I still love you,
I still care,
I don't care what the world say,
but I still love you
I still, I still,
I still love you
I still, I still
Care for my baby
No matter what they say
What they do
I still love you
I still, I still
Care for your baby
No matter what you do, what they say
You still my baby
You still my baby
Little baby
Little baby
Little baby
Hmm, hmm
